channel.title: Suggestion
channel.description: Personally, i think if you're server goes down for i don't know, 12 hours? You loose ALOT off uptime, so it will take you to like 3rd page? and when you put it back on, you're getting barley any players, i think the uptime should increase Faster when its online.

item.title: Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Then my suggestion would be to not go offline for 12 hours, I keep track of uptime in a statistically correct manner and I don’t want to fudge numbers to make uptime increase faster than it decreases or anything like that. Then it wouldn’t be much of a server status page, would it?

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

Personally, i think if you’re server goes down for i don’t know, 12 hours? You loose ALOT off uptime, so it will take you to like 3rd page? and when you put it back on, you’re getting barley any players, i think the uptime should increase Faster when its online.

Read full topic
